site_name: OAK SHADOWS RANCH L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 pm-1:00
pm on 23-APR-19.
Inspector waited by gate at end of driveway, honked horn of vehicle, phoned twice; licensee called to state he was
not available for several more hours.
